delivering solutions across multiple channels, including Web self-service and live agent support

Which of the following is part of the Sales Cloud 2.
*Choose 4 answers.*

Universal Containers wants to capture the invoice number and account credit score for billing cases. How would an administrator accomplish this?
*Choose 2 answers*

Universal Containers wants to create a custom object to capture account survey data. Users must be able to select an account from the survey record. Users also need the ability to view related surveys on the account record.
How should the system administrator meet these requirements.
*Choose 2 answers*

answerOptions.describe: Create a lookup relationship field on the survey object
Add the account related list to the survey page layout
Add the survey related list to the account page layout.
Create a lookup relationship field on the account object.

questions.describe:
What option is available when scheduling a dashboard refresh?

Which chart type can be used to display summary values from two different levels of grouping in a report?
*Choose 2 answers*

Criteria-based sharing rules can be created for which objects?
*Choose 3 answers*
What will occur when a system administrator creates a dynamic dashboard?

Which feature license can be assigned to a user record in salesforce?
*Choose 2 answers*

A sales user in Universal containers has updated the opportunity stage for an opportunity in the pipeline. What may be updated as a result of the stage change?
*Choose 2 answers*

Sales management at Universal Containers needs to display the information listed below on each account record.
1. Amount of all closed won opportunities
2. Amount of all open opportunities
Which feature should a system admin use to meet the requirement?

answerOptions.describe: Calculated columns in the related list.

questions.describe:
What is a capability of Salesforce Knowledge?
*Choose 2 answers:*

answerOptions.describe: Knowledge automatically creates a solution for each new article
Knowledge uses data categories and roles to make articles visible to specific users
Knowledge only allows a single article type across all data categories
Knowledge allows an organization to share articles with partner portal users

questions.describe:
What item appears in a user's My Unresolved items after synchronisation using Salesforce for outlook?
*Choose 2 answers*

answerOptions.describe: Notes not associated to a record.
Emails not associated to a record.
Contacts not assigned to an account
Cases not assigned to a contact

questions.describe:
What should be considered when configuring the lead conversion process?
*Choose 2 answers*

answerOptions.describe: Roll-up summary lead field can be mapped to custom contact fields.
Standard lead fields are automatically converted to account, contact and opportunity fields.
Custom lead fields can be mapped to account, contact and opportunity fields.
Custom lead fields can be mapped to custom object field

questions.describe: Universal Containers requires that its Salesforce account data, including attachments, be backed up weekly. Which tool should a system administrator use to accomplish this?

A user profile has login hour restrictions set to Monday through Friday 8:00 AM to 5:00 Pm. It is Tuesday and the user has logged in at 4:30PM and it is now 5:01PM Which behaviour of the application should the user expect?

answerOptions.describe: The user will be able to continue working and start new sessions.
The user will be logged out and any unsaved work-in-progress will be saved
The user will be able to continue working, but will not be unable to start a new sessions.
The user will be logged out and any unsaved work-in-progress will be lost

questions.describe: What will occur when a system administrator creates a dynamic dashboard?

answerOptions.describe: The data displayed varies based on the user viewing the dashboard
The dashboard component resize based on the device used to view the
The dashboard automatically sends an email when the underlying data.
The dashboard refreshes automatically whenever the underlying data

questions.describe:
What can a marketing user do using the Manage Members button on a campaign record?
*Choose 2 answers*

A universal containers has a private sharing model in which regional sales managers can view and edit opportunities in only their own regions. For reporting purposes they additionally need read only access to opportunities in other regions.
What permission can a system administrator enable to meet this requirement in the regional sales managers custom profiles?

What can users do with Mobile Lite?
*Choose 2 answers*

answerOptions.describe: View campaigns and manage campaign members.
View, create, edit and delete accounts, contacts and opportunities.
View, create, edit and delete custom objects.
Search for records that were not previously downloaded to a mobile device

questions.describe:
Which component can be included in a custom home page layout?
*Choose 3 answers*

How can Knowledge articles be used?
*Choose 2 answers*

The marketing team at Universal Containers wants to send an email to each lead received from its website. The country of the incoming lead should determine the language of the email that will be sent to the lead.

answerOptions.describe: create a single email template and use the translation workbench to translate and send the appropriate template ?
create an email template for each language and an auto response rule to send the appropriate template?
create an email template for each language and an assignment rule to send the appropriate template ?
create an email template for each language and a workflow alert to send the appropriate template

questions.describe:
A system administrator at Universal containers needs to prevent sales representatives from editing fields on an opportunity once the opportunity has been moved to a closed stage.
*Choose 2 answers.*

answerOptions.describe: record types and read-only page layouts

questions.describe: When the multiple currencies feature is enabled, which currency is used as the basics for all currency conversion rates?

A marketing user needs to create a new campaign, but the New Button is NOT visible from the campaign home page. The system administrator has verified that the user has the "Create" profile permission for the campaign object.
How should the system admin resolve the issue?
When are validation rules applied when using Salesforce for Outlook?

answerOptions.describe: Every time a record is saved
Every time a record is updated
Every time a user view's a record
Every time data is synchronised with the server.
